jobDescription: Position requires a graduate degree in a quantitative discipline, a minimum of 2 years coding experience C++ or C#, scripting language experience, experience in processing large data sets and exposure to equity market data. Key words: Data Engineer, Data Scientist, Equity Market Data, ETL Please refer to Job # 22834 and send attached resume to ...@analyticrecruiting.com If you are a suitable candidate, you can expect: - a follow-up call to further discuss the position, your interests and expertise. - Your resume will be sent to our client(s) only after we obtain your approval. Investment Management firm seeks a Data Engineer to help design and implement proprietary quantitative investment systems. Will work closely with quantitative research and portfolio management teams and gain exposure to sophisticated investment research. Responsibilities will include developing proprietary data stores and platforms and performance analytic systems, automating ETL processes from Market Data providers, and implementing quantitative investment models.  Associated topics: data administrator, data integration, data manager, data scientist, database, database administrator, etl, mongo database, sybase, teradata
